Detailed Description

Plot space delegate.

) [virtual]

Notifies that plot space has changed a plot range.

Parameters:
spaceThe plot space.
coordinateThe coordinate of the range.
BOOL CPTPlotSpaceDelegate-p::plotSpace:shouldHandlePointingDeviceCancelledEvent: ( CPTPlotSpace *  space,
[shouldHandlePointingDeviceCancelledEvent] id  event 
) [virtual]

Notifies that plot space intercepted a device cancelled event.

Parameters:
spaceThe plot space.
eventThe native event (e.g., UIEvent on iPhone)
Returns:
Whether the plot space should handle the event or not. In either case, the delegate may choose to take extra actions, or handle the scaling itself.

[atPoint] CGPoint  point 
) [virtual]

Notifies that plot space intercepted a device down event.

Parameters:
spaceThe plot space.
eventThe native event (e.g., UIEvent on iPhone)
pointThe point in the host view.
Returns:
Whether the plot space should handle the event or not. In either case, the delegate may choose to take extra actions, or handle the scaling itself.

BOOL CPTPlotSpaceDelegate-p::plotSpace:shouldScaleBy:aboutPoint: ( CPTPlotSpace *  space,
[shouldScaleBy] CGFloat  interactionScale,
[aboutPoint] CGPoint  interactionPoint 
) [virtual]

Informs the receiver that it should uniformly scale (e.g., in response to a pinch on iOS)

Parameters:
spaceThe plot space.
interactionScaleThe scaling factor.
interactionPointThe coordinates of the scaling centroid.
Returns:
YES should be returned if the gesture should be handled by the plot space, and NO to prevent handling. In either case, the delegate may choose to take extra actions, or handle the scaling itself.
CPTPlotRange * CPTPlotSpaceDelegate-p::plotSpace:willChangePlotRangeTo:forCoordinate: ( CPTPlotSpace *  space,
[willChangePlotRangeTo] CPTPlotRange *  newRange,
[forCoordinate] CPTCoordinate  coordinate 
) [virtual]

Notifies that plot space is going to change a plot range.

Parameters:
spaceThe plot space.
newRangeThe proposed new plot range.
coordinateThe coordinate of the range.
Returns:
The new plot range to be used.
CGPoint CPTPlotSpaceDelegate-p::plotSpace:willDisplaceBy: ( CPTPlotSpace *  space,
[willDisplaceBy] CGPoint  proposedDisplacementVector 
) [virtual]

Notifies that plot space is going to scroll.

Parameters:
spaceThe plot space.
proposedDisplacementVectorThe proposed amount by which the plot space will shift
Returns:
The displacement actually applied.
